original: Arvidsson, Karl Erik Gustav, tandläkare, Västervik, f. 8/9/10 i Rogslösa, östergötl. 1., av stat iförest. Arvid Pettersson o. Minna Gyllenhammar. G. 35 m. Ellen Svensson. Barn: Ulla f. 36, Kerstin 39. — Studrex. i Linköp. 30, tandl:kand. 31, tandl. 33. Assist, i Kisa 33-34, prakt, i Västervik sed. 35, skoltandl. i Överums kommun sed. 35, i Törnsfalls 36-38.
translated: Arvidsson, Karl Erik Gustav, dentist, Västervik, b. 8/9/10 in Rogslösa, Östergötland, oldest child of state official Arvid Pettersson and Minna Gyllenhammar. Married to Ellen Svensson in 1935. Children: Ulla b. 1936, Kerstin b. 1939. - Studied at Linköping University in 1930, became a dental student in 1931, and graduated as a dentist in 1933. Worked as an assistant in Kisa from 1933-1934 and ran his own dental practice in Västervik from 1935. Also served as a school dentist in the Överum municipality since 1935, and in Törnsfall from 1936-1938.
